MUNTHLY HANAGEREHT Statue Brunt paouecT No.:_B-266
PROVECT TITLE: SELECTIVE REMOVAL OF ALDEHYDE! a
BuOGeT: $18,641 PAIS: 3450/00

 

 

PROJECT DESCRIPTION:

‘This project is a continuation of 8-265 (1979). The development of
filter materials for selectively renoving low molecular weight aldehydes
{acrolein, acetaldenyde) from cigarette smoke. Several materials have
been discovered that will react semi-selectively with low molecular

_ weight aldehydes. Additional work is needed to develop practical
ethods of application and search for economically attractive additives.

summary: The project is a continuation of 8-265 (1979) The development of materials for selectively renoving low molecular weight aldehydes from cigarette smoke. Several materials have been discovered that will react semi-selectively with low-molecular-weights. Additional work is needed to develop practicalethods of application.
